name: baseball
content:

A1 [ U ] a game played especially in North America by two teams of nine players, in which a player hits a ball with a bat (= stick) and tries to run around four bases on a large field before the other team returns the ball: Jake never played baseball like the other kids. Compare
hardball
softball
[ C ] the ball used in the game of baseball: He had a baseball and a couple of bats in his sports bag. His fame is rooted in his extraordinary ability to hit baseballs where fielders could not catch them.

a game with two teams of nine players in which a ball, thrown by a pitcher, is hit by a player with a bat (= special stick) who then tries to run around four bases before being stopped by the other team
A baseball is the ball used in this game.
